channel.title: Npc + Command help
channel.description:
Well, I am currenly trying to make the Chaos Elemental non-agressive (So it dosen't attack you until you attack it) And, I would like to know how to make certain monsters stronger/ weaker Also, I would like to know how to make commands such as: Givemod etc, ::staffzone, ::camelot, :falador and so on
Thanks for your help :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2009, 04:41:14 pm[/size][hr]BUMP >: o
